description: Put a spring in your step with this fresh dinner idea. Make succulent barbecued lamb gyros at home for a family feast with this easy recipe.
name: Garlic & Oregano Barbecued Lamb Gyros Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat barbecue flatplate over high heat. Rub lamb with oil. Cook lamb for 3 minutes on each side or until browned. Turn off flatplate and turn chargrill on to low. Cook lamb on flatplate, with hood closed and using indirect heat for 35 minutes, turning halfway through cooking. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 10 minutes. Thinly slice.
Spread wraps with aioli. Top with lettuce, tomato, onion and lamb. Season with pepper and squeeze over lemon juice. Roll wraps to enclose filling and serve.
